title: GotoAnnaMaria
body:
Press put concoction on statue button


"Thank you discipulus!"


"Oh no my books must have fallen when I was attacked by that beast."

[[ Help |Helper]]   [[ Don't do anything|Slacker]]

title: Helper
body:
Help Anna Maria pick up the books

Button give the quill 


"Oh thank you. 

 You should not help me, the other students might bully you too if they see you help me."


 [[I don't care about bullies|conversationmaria]] [[No problem! happy to help!|conversationmaria]]

title: Slacker
body:
Anna Maria picks up the books.


Give the quill button. 


Anna Maria leaves 
See book on the ground

Pick up book button


See Buys Ballot on the cover


<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]

Anna Maria van Schurman's character sheet appears

Route to next location appears

title: conversationmaria
body:
"I even  have to take classes hidden behind a curtain because of those bullies.
But it is not that all bad, Professor Voetius has been very kind in helping me join the University."


Anna Maria leaves 


See book on the ground


Pick up book button


See Buys Ballot on the cover


<<if visited("AnnaMaria")is true>> >> [[ Go to Buys Ballot|GotoBuysBallot]]

Anna Maria van Schurman's character sheet appears
